sources.title: HIGH SCHOOL BIG SHOT (1959)
sources.description: Juvenile deliquents! Teenage gangs! This is the movie that showed the big time how! Stars Tom Pittman and a cast of various hoods.

sources.title: High School Big Shot
sources.description: This film has fallen into the Public Domain.

sources.title: High School Big Shot (1959) ROGER CORMAN
sources.description:
Movie Class by PizzaFLIX: Legendary cult filmmaker Roger Corman has directed
over 50 films and produced nearly 400 more. In the process he helped launch the careers
of Jack Nicholson, Robert De Niro, Charles Bronson, Sylvester Stallone, Francis Ford Coppola, Martin Scorsese, Ron Howard, Robert Towne, Peter Bogdanovich, and James Cameron!

Stars: Tom Pittman, Virginia Aldridge, Howard Veit
Director: Joel Rapp

A teenager gets involved in a $1M heist to impress a high school femme fatale.

metadata.Plot: Marv needs money. His unemployed dad is so poor that he makes Marv give up half his last six bucks so they can both go on three-dollar dates; he's just lost his scholarship after getting caught writing a term paper for Betty, the prettiest (and only) girl in his class; and Betty herself has told him he doesn't stand a chance with her unless he can give her what she wants most: money, money, money. But Marv has mob ties and Marv knows where to find a million dollars cash...
metadata.Actors: Tom Pittman, Virginia Aldridge, Howard Veit
